definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Even there, though, industrial districts are blacked out one day in three.
sentences.chinese: 即便在長沙，工業區每3天天停一天電。

sentences.english: I remember once we went to see an open-air movie.
sentences.chinese: 記得有一次去看露天電影。

sentences.english: They saw a film in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 他們看了一場露天電影。

sentences.english: It has high resistance to the interference of industrial electricity and the interference of other atmospherics.
sentences.chinese: 抗工業電干擾及其它天電干擾能力強等。

sentences.english: Many cities and towns host free outdoor movies during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏日來臨，許多城鎮會主辦一些免費露天電影。

sentences.english: Finally, I picked up Karen and we headed for the drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我在開往露天電影場的路上捎上卡倫。
